document.title: Citizenship of Brenkrike
document.paragraph: Gaining Citizenship There is currently only one legal way to become a citizen of Brenkrike, and that is by nomination of the King or Queen of Brenkrike. Should you wish to become a citizen, please email King Christopher with details about what you have to offer our great nation.

Population Statistics The Office for National Statistics is currently vacant, and therefore no statistics can be published. An officer will be appointed shortly, allowing the publication of statistics in this section of the website.
